remarks: Equivalent expressions for equality with a function operation. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2016.)
statement:
offveq.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
offveq.2 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
offveq.3 $e |- ( ph -> G Fn A ) $.
offveq.4 $e |- ( ph -> H Fn A ) $.
offveq.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = B ) $.
offveq.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( G ` x ) = C ) $.
offveqb $p |- ( ph -> ( H = ( F oF R G ) <-> A. x e. A ( H ` x ) = ( B R C ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
